articles.title: Prince's estate to release 'lost' 2010 album 'Welcome 2 America' in July - NBC News
articles.description: Prince's "Welcome 2 America," a 12-track album recorded in 2010, will debut July 30, the singer's estate said in a statement.
articles.content:
Five years after Prince's death, the singer's estate plans to release a never-before-heard album from a cache of unreleased music.

articles.title: Prince’s ‘Welcome 2 America,’ an Unreleased Album, Is Due Out in July - The New York Times
articles.description: The politically minded, never-before-heard 2010 album will be the first complete project released from Prince’s storied vault.

articles.title: Fauci: Almost a race between vaccinations and the surge - CNN
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci is cautioning Americans from declaring victory over Covid-19 because there there are signs that a surge could be coming. He talks with CNN's Anderson Cooper about the state of the fight against the coronavirus.

articles.author: Martina Bet
articles.title: EU split over Moderna as 16 states rejected vaccine before UK breakthrough - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EU appears to be split on the Moderna vaccine, as a delivery schedule posted by the Hungarian government claims that more than half of member states did not order as many doses of the American jab as they could have.

articles.title: Neurological or mental disorders affect a third of Covid-19 survivors: Study - India Today
articles.description: One in three Covid-19 survivors in a study of more than 230,000, mostly American patients, are affected with mental and neurological problems, scientists have said.
